content: "Welcome." "I'm Honda. I have a reservation for 10 o'clock." "Thank you for coming. Today, we’ll be providing a taxi service. It will take a little more for the taxi to arrive, so please wait here, if you don’t mind." "Alright then, I'll just go have a smoke while I wait."
translations: ita:Benvenuto. Sono Honda. Ho una prenotazione per le 10. Grazie per essere venuto. Oggi, forniremo un servizio taxi. Ci vor
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by urro (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
